    • Uses of Event in GSILabs.BModel

      Subinterfaces of Event in GSILabs.BModel 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ImpermanentEvent
      An impermanent event is an event that has a limited time span, typically restricted to minutes or hours.
      interface  LastingEvent
      Event that spans over several dates and/or locations.
